meanings.sent1: The doctor said my illness was curable with the right treatment.
meanings.sent2: Cancer is curable if detected early and treated promptly.
meanings.sent3: I found it funny that my friend thought a broken toy was curable with a band-aid.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude made her believe that any problem was curable with a smile.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained that mistakes in math were curable with practice and patience.

meanings.sent1: The vet assured us that our cat's infection was curable with antibiotics.
meanings.sent2: Most common colds are curable with rest and fluids.
meanings.sent3: It seemed strange to think that a flat tire was curable with a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent4: The old wise woman believed that a broken heart was curable with time and self-love.
meanings.sent5: The gardener knew that wilting plants were curable with proper watering and sunlight.
